add android_serial so that only uiComparison emulator is used for screenshot comparison

timeline.bodyText: @tobiasKaminsky This leads to lint issues since the linter now works in "Lollipop-Mode" which is wrong for the app itself :(
timeline.author: AndyScherzinger

replies.bodyText:
Where do you see these problems?
On Drone coverage parameter is only set for test-stable, test-master, but not for analysis.
replies.author: tobiasKaminsky

replies.bodyText: Ah, indeed this is somehow in https://www.kaminsky.me/nc-dev/android-lint/16486.html#ObsoleteSdkInt
replies.author: tobiasKaminsky

replies.bodyText:
Ha, read it wrong, but this is they way to go:
Only enable "minSdkVersion" when using screenshots…
Let me test & do it.
replies.author: tobiasKaminsky
